title: Register internal dashboard routes in frontend/src/App.tsx (no refactors)

requirements.summary: Register new TanStack Router routes for existing dashboard pages in App.tsx by adding only missing imports, new createRoute constants, and appending them to routeTree childrenâ€”without altering existing router setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Only `frontend/src/App.tsx` is changed; no other files are modified.
Existing imports, routes, and router setup remain unchanged except for adding necessary imports and new route definitions.
New routes are added only as additional `createRoute` constants and included in the `routeTree` children array (appended without removing existing entries) (no router refactor).

file_operations.description: Add missing imports for the existing dashboard page components (only if not already imported), define new `createRoute({ ... })` constants for the dashboard paths, and append the new route variables to the existing `routeTree = rootRoute.addChildren([ ... ])` array without changing/removing any existing routes or structure.

requirements.summary: Add 7 exact-path routes mapping to the corresponding existing dashboard components, ensuring they render instead of the 404 page.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to each of the 7 listed paths renders the corresponding existing dashboard component instead of the 404 page.
The route `path` strings match exactly the requested paths (including leading slashes and spelling).
No new dashboard components are created and no existing dashboard files are edited.
All new route constants are included in the `routeTree` children array (appended without removing existing entries).

file_operations.description: Register these routes (exact `path` strings) using new `createRoute` constants that point to the default exports from the specified files, and append them to `rootRoute.addChildren([ ... ])`: `/superadmin/dashboard` -> `SuperadminDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/superadmin/SuperadminDashboard.tsx`; `/admin/dashboard` -> `AdminDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboard.tsx`; `/asistenmu/dashboard` -> `AsistenmuDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/asistenmu/AsistenmuDashboard.tsx`; `/concierge/dashboard` -> `ConciergeDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/concierge/ConciergeDashboard.tsx`; `/strategicpartner/dashboard` -> `StrategicPartnerDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/strategicpartner/StrategicPartnerDashboard.tsx`; `/management/dashboard` -> `ManagementDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/management/ManagementDashboard.tsx`; `/finance/dashboard` -> `FinanceDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceDashboard.tsx`. If any of these components are already imported, do not modify that import; only add missing import lines.
